about_the_game:
This DLC does NOT include ANY content and is purely a way to donate to the development of SafeZone and help support updates and future games. Currently I am in a intense loss for this game and anything will help support future work (:

I made a vow when I started this game I would release all game content for free so instead of adding DLC gameplay (pay to play) I will being using this as a way to donate and rather updating the game with free updates.
